post_title: FS: T206 Miller Huggins Hands at Mouth Sweet Caporal 350/30 PSA 2
post_content: Hi - looking to sell the pictured card - nice presenting T206 Miller Huggins Sweet Caporal 350/30 back - for $269 net to me shipped - please see pics for details. Can send additional pics if needed (please ignore my shadow while taking the pictures).  Please communicate via PM and reach out with any questions. Thanks!
Bump - will accept any reasonable offers. Thanks!
